DOC.brief_title: Excitatory rTMS Left Dorsolateral Pre-Frontal Cortex Reduce Cannabis-Cue Induced Craving
DOC.detailed_description: Our primary aim determine effect single session 10 Hz L DLPFC rTMS cannabis cue induce craving ( Aim1 ) , behavioral task impulsive decision making ( Aim2 ) , non-treatment seek individual Cannabis Use Disorder . The aim study accomplished perform double-blind , sham-controlled crossover trial .
